system.requirements:
Tier 2; Awareness +10, Intelligence 35 or Perception 35
Aptitudes: Perception, Defence
system.effect:
Character uses "X" when rolling for initiative instead of their Agility vlaue, and rolls two dice for the roll, choosing the highest of the two.
X may be either Intelligence or Perception, with the requirements matching the characteristic.
